io.spire.api
Class Api.ApiDescriptionModel

java.lang.Object
  io.spire.api.Api.ApiDescriptionModel
Enclosing class:
Api
public static class Api.ApiDescriptionModel
extends Object

Describes the Spire Api description resource model obtained from Api.discover() This class knows how to parse the Api description resource

Since:
1.0
